Title: Semper Fidelis
Writer: Stan Lee (based on the Marvel comics by), Bill Everett (based on the Marvel comics by), Drew Goddard (created by), Luke Kalteux, Whit Anderson (executive story editor), Luke Kalteux (executive story editor), Sneha Koorse (executive story editor)
Actors: Charlie Cox, Deborah Ann Woll, Elden Henson, Jon Bernthal
Plot: Murdock and Foggy take on the DA in the trial of the century, but their client refuses to play along. Murdock struggles to balance his dual identities.
